about_the_game:
Our love for fairytales can stay with us for years and years. We're here to show you that adults love them too. And love them passionately. Or should we say — love the more... passionate fairytales?
Here come the spicy readings of famous stories with lascivious beauties, princes, dwarves, giants and witches... Everyone you've been waiting for is here for you!

What if the Little Mermaid gets more from the sea witch than just... legs? What if Rapunzel discovers the hidden potential of her hair? Hansel and Gretel are long past being kids, and they're ready to defeat the witch in a different way. And speaking of the Red Riding Hood and the Wolf... Those two can definitely come to a mutually beneficial agreement.


In these series you can pick a character who suits you more ❤️
What would you prefer?
A hot classic? 🍆🍑
Steamy manly embraces? 🍆🍆
Tender feminine care? 🍑🍑
Our all at once? 👀
This time we intend to satisfy every request! ❤️


There are many retellings of old fairytales, and we want to share our own recipe — perfectly spiced, peppery, and certainly very furry!

Features:
• Several fairytail stories where you can choose your character’s gender!
• Original illustrations
• Longer animated sex scenes with sound effects and voiceover
• Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards [/p]

• Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features nude male and female furry characters, explicit graphic sex scenes between them, BDSM, public sex and scenes featuring alcohol and intoxication.
